 Global basic income of $30 per month for all humans, will lift billions of people out of extreme poverty

column1816: Whilst I feel the idea would be great, in reality it would be difficult to implement and convince people to adopt. Furthermore, such laws would require countries to properly be able to act on companies trying to bypass the law or ignore it.
